verses.text:
When Jesus comes to reign,
The desert land shall sing;
And flowers of Paradise
Shall in the wilderness spring.

When Jesus comes to reign,
Our happy eyes shall see
The glorious hope of Israel,
The Branch of David's tree.

When Jesus comes to reign,
The blind shall see the light;
The lame shall run like hinds,
The deaf shall hear aright.

When Jesus comes to reign,
The dead in Christ shall rise;
The living saints shall meet him,
The Lord above the skies.

When Jesus comes to reign,
Peace over earth shall flow;
The wolf and lamb together
Shall graze where flowers grow.
